DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate inflammatory response prognostic factor atrial fibrillation recurrency ablation . Inflammatory response assess double measurement C-reactive protein , fibroblast growth factor 2 ( FGF2 ) , matrix metallopeptidase 8 ( MMP8 ) body temperature . Dynamics change troponin I measure additionally . After ablation patient monitor ECG telemonitoring system 7 day .
